prologue1: Pleassssseeeee stay here and pet me!
Dont't worry, I'm not going anyw-
(This is getting out of hand. There’s three- no, four- no, FIVE THOUSAND OF THEM???)
Before she knew it. Dazy's thoughts whree drowned out my a chorus of expectant mews.
prologue2: Ahh! Oh, phew, it was just a dream.. I was about to drown from the sheer fluffiness.
(It’s eight o’ clock, right on the dot. I’m Dazy Washi, and someway, somehow, I’ve become the star worker of Stooples, a small stationery company.)
(We might be small, but we’ve caught the attention of so many people across the country…)
(And you could say I’m the brains. Yes.. I design a lot of the pens, erasers, and other cute stuff people love and love to use~)
(And I also do 99% of Manager Miu’s work. And also approximately 80% of my coworkers’ work. Oh, but it’s nothing, really!)
(As long as I have a pumpkin latte in the morning, I can do anything, right? Hahaha…)
(S-sorry! No more time to entertain you with my inner thoughts. This stationery isn’t going to make itself…)
Sigh I can’t believe this is how I have to get dressed for work every morning. Manager’s been watching too much anime…
prologue3: Heh, that was really something, right? My Sweet little Potato~
(My owner, Dazy, sweeps me up in her arms.)
(Ugh… this is nice, but how DARE she call me Sweet Potato!)
(My true name, just so you know, is LORD Sweet Potato. I have to be prepared for when felines take over the world one day!)
(Though that might take a while. My neighbors just flop around and eat Mew Mix all day. Ugh! One day they’ll understand..)
(Okayyyy. I guess maybe I don’t mind… Just this once!)
(She could have lingered upon my fluffy brilliance just a moment longer before eloping to that terrible place once more. Such a tragedy…)
(Just so you know, I’m not just any ordinary cat. I’ve got an owner to save – from a terrible, no-good, very bad job!)
(Dazy never has any time for me anymore.. I miss her silly baby voice… how quickly she’d move around the lazer pointer…)
(It’s like she’s already gone off to war…)
(And she’s so, so tired, too. She’s not exactly nocturnal like me.. She always looks like she’s in need of a serious catnap!)
(Which is why I’ve got a mission. A plan like no other.)
(With these little paws and claws of mine…)
(Dazy won’t need to worry about a job anymore, because she won’t have a job after I sneak in!)
(And you, dear player, shall bear witness to my nyoble meowssion!)
scene1: (I’m a bit late, but of course, Manager doesn’t care. They’ve always been a fly-at-the-seat-of-their-pajama-pants type…)
(I’m pretty sure their mom gave this job to them as a birthday gift. Well, at least they seem to be having fun.)
Oh, seems like nobody else has come in yet~ Lucky you, you’re the early bird! Who gets warm, or something like that!
(It appears my other coworkers have begun emulating Manager’s behaviors. The most immediate consequence of this being that I’m the only one here…)
(Which is a-okay! It’s totally, surely fine! Just gotta lock-in, spiffen up, and everything will be just great! For sure!! *Hhhhh*…)
Oh yeah! I got a super-duper surprise announcement for all of you guys. Except you’re like.. the only one here for me to tell it to.
(I know I do a lot of work at this company, b-but… I’m not that skilled. I don’t get what everyone here sees in me…)
Just kidding LOLLLLLL. But dude, you cannot WAIT to hear this.
(Why do I feel… a sense of unease?)
So I got an email from the creators of this super-cool magical girl anime, like bro they’re SO COOL I’m on like episode 7 and the dynamics between everyone on the team are-
ANYWAYS so they said that we could make super-special stationery for them! But, uh, we need to get it done by..
Manager, are you absolutely certain that.. this wasn’t a.. you know.. spam email?
NOOOOOO I SWEAR ITS REAL TRUST!!!
They sent me concept art of Sprinkle Sugar Buns…
How could I say no to Sprinkle Sugar Buns…
Also they sent me the email last month hahaha whoops.
Sorry dude, you’re like the only one who showed up for this, so…
So… you’re saying you want me to create a whole new stationery line..
(I’m at a loss for words. Stooples)
Is counting on me. But this time feels deeply different.)
(If I can’t get this set done by tonight, I know Manager will be devastated. So devastated, in fact, that I wouldn’t be surprised if they did something drastic…)
(I really miss my cat at times like these…)
N-not to worry, Manager! I assure you, this set will be done by the end of my shift. I w-won’t let you down!
Now that’s the Dazy I know! Get this — if you can actually pull this off I’ll give you a super super mega ultra promotion..
(People with that much money.. scare me a bit. But I guess I can’t complain that they’re offering to be so generous!)
(Time to go check out the details of this commission with Manager.. Here goes nothing — or should I say, everything.)
(YES! Adorable pens everywhere, a perfectly assembled desk, hair barettes here, there, and everywhere)
This has GOT to be Dazy’s office. Also she literally just left it but shhh I was trying to make this dramatic-)
(Time for me to do all the things I love doing, hehe. Okayyy, I try not to be too misbehaved around Dazy, but…)
(At the shelter, trust me. I was their biggest menace! Scratching up all the rugs, knocking over any cup I could find…)
(I was the coolest cat in town! Man, those were the days…)
(Ugh, hope I’m not too rusty now. Can’t believe my first birthday was a few weeks ago… I’m already sooooo ancient…)
(Time to cause as much havoc as I can! Oh, but I gotta make sure I hide before Dazy comes back!)
scene1_game: Help Sweet Potato get Dazy fired by finding items to knock over in her office before the timer runs out!
There might be a special sticker/stationery to find in the room that’ll give you extra points! If you find all of them, something interesting might happen…
scene1end: (All right! Looks like I’ve caused a fair share of mischief. Wait a second — I hear footsteps!)
(Wheretohide wheretohide.. Oh! Maybe if I squeeze in right behind this desk…)
(Phew! Just in time! She won’t know a thing~)
Dazy comes back, and types and types away. Sweet Potato falls asleep to the meownotonous noise..
scene2: (It’s been three hours, and not a soul has showed up to this place.)
(Looks like I’m totally on my own here. Whichisokaywhichisgreatwhichisjustfineanddandy!!!! I’m totally not about to explode!!)
Phew… Research is done, so it’s time to start working on all this new stationery. All I need is some tape, some plastic, and-
(Wait a moment. What- what happened to my office?)
(These papers are overturned, my computer’s scratched up, and — ?!)
The stickers I just made — they’re gone?!
(I’m in absolute disbelief. I know I’m tired, but.. Did I dream making the past few stickers?)
(It’s like the whole desk has been ransacked. Things are out of place, papers sticking to my sleeves. My pulse won’t stop racing.)
Okay, okay… deep breaths. Maybe I just misplaced them. Maybe the stickers are hiding under–
(Nope. Not under the folders. Not in the drawers. Not even taped to the bottom of the desk, which yes, I did check. Don’t judge me.)
This doesn’t make sense – I just made those stickers. They were right here… I can still smell the ink! Unless the ghosts are running a black-market stationery shop.
(The door creaks. Heavy footsteps shuffle closer. My stomach drops.)
Hey!! Wait, you doing alright? You look… kinda wired, dude.
Manager! Thank goodness. Something’s wrong. My stickers are missing, and the whole desk is a mess, and I–
Mn. Meh… it’s a little messy in here, I guess. Happens when you’ve been at it for a while.
yes! Messy, exactly! Can you help me look? Please?
Nope, not seeing them. They’ll turn up, though. Stuff always does!
…That’s it? That’s your big help? (I don’t know what I was expecting..)
Chill out, Daze! Losing a thing or two doesn’t mean you’re losing your mind. Probably just misplaced ‘em while you were in the zone.
Misplaced?!! I don’t just misplace a whole batch of stickers! Unless I’m sleepwalking through arts-and-crafts disasters now.
That’s just a Tuesday around here! Whatever~
(…Unless…unless I’VE BEEN ABDUCTED BY ALIEN SPACE COWS AND THEIR EXPERIMENTS MADE ME BELIEVE THAT I WORKED ON MAKING STICKERS IN ORDER TO COPE WITH THEIR PROBING SHENANIGANS.)
(No, no, Dazy, think logically. Now, where could those stickers have wondered off to? Hmmmmm…)
(Finally!!!! She’s out again! Aw. I did feel kinda bad hearing her freak out a little, but..)
(Gotta keep reminding myself. This is for the biggest, bestest cause in the WORLD!)
(And once I’m done, I can get all the headpats I’ve ever dreamed of~)
(I scurry under the desk, my tail flicking with excitement. A sticker sheet clings to my paw.)
(Look at this haul! Perfectly glossy, beautifully cut, smells like victory. Of course she’s confused– she doesn’t realize I’m basically a professional thief. Meowhaha!!)
(My ears twitch as a high-pitched voice drifts into the room.)
(Uh-oh. The tall one’s here. Or uh, at least they seem tall, sitting in that big.. moving… couch thing. They’re… so chill. Almost suspiciously chill. What if they’re onto me?!)
(They bend, searching under the desk. I freeze, my whiskers trembling. …But then, they lift one paper, shrug, and leave.)
(Phew. They didn’t see a thing! Classic manager– the guy could trip over a parade and just say, “neat”!)
(I dart up onto a shelf, knocking a pen cup askew, just enough to add to the chaos.)
(Heehee. Gotta keep her on her toes! Can’t have her catching on too fast. Besides… watching her unravel is half the fun. Like a big, biggg ball of yarn! Oh.. but maybe not too much…)
(Don’t worry, D. It’s all for the cause. Someday you’ll thank me. …Right after I get all the headpats in the universe~)
scene2_game: Help Sweet Potato get Dazy fired by finding items to knock over in her office before the timer runs out!
There might be a special sticker/stationery to find in the room that’ll give you extra points! If you find all of them, something interesting might happen…
scene3: **yawn** I’m getting very tired, but I must continue working on this project. I mustn’t let Manager or our customers down..
Okay… okay, deep breaths. (Remember what you learned in choir practice!) Maybe I simply misplaced the stickers?
Maybe they just… sprouted legs and walked away. Happens all the time, am I right? Totallynormalworkplacehazard. Haha, it’s not like Sweet Potato leapt onto my desk and had anything to do with it!
(Alright, Dazy. You need to stop talking to yourself and think logically…)
Right. Tape. Plastic. Scissors. A functioning brain. I’ve got at least two of those, maybe three on a good day.
...Wh–...What was that?! No. Nope! Don’t even start, it was probably just the printer. Or the fridge… or a raccoon with a master’s degree in office sabotage.

Holy cow, I feel like a spreadsheet somebody spilled coffee on. Speaking of – I could really go for a venti pumpkin latte with oat milk, 5 pumps of pumpkin sauce, 2 pumps of caramel sauce, extra whipped cream and sprinkles on top..
Haha… Yeah, that would be really nice to go for right about now. Okay Dazy... focus! You’re just working at three in the morning with disappearing stationery and imaginary raccoons – totally normal!
(Dazy seems to have completely lost her marbles… maybe I went too far?)
(Am I really going to have a crisis about whether my actions these past few hours have been morally righteous or completely in the wrong?)
(Besides, the world’s biggest cause doesn’t wait for office hours!! Justice— and sticker heists— happen at night!)
(Note to self: sneak her one sticker back later. She’ll think she hallucinated it. Perfect plan, hehe.)
scene3_game: Help Sweet Potato get Dazy fired by finding items to knock over in her office before the timer runs out!
There might be a special sticker/stationery to find in the room that’ll give you extra points! If you find all of them, something interesting might happen…
scene4: It’s 5AM. The office lights hiss like skittish cats. My eyes feel like they’re lined with sandpaper, but I’m still here. Still working. Or… trying to.
Morning. Ah… That’s what this is, right? Morning.. Sun’s probably rising, birds are chirping… and I’m stapling the same blank piece of paper for the fourth time.
(Piles of stationery are stacked in wobbly towers around me. Half the stickers are gone. The tape dispenser’s empty. My keyboard has crumbs in it that I don’t remember creating.)
What am I even making anymore? These aren’t stationery kits, they’re Frankenstein’s monsters. Tape here, folded paper there, and—oh, great. This one has glue on it. Lovely.
(There’s a crash. Something fell behind the desk. I freeze.)
Right. Nobody. Just me, and my tattered brain eating itself alive...
(I lean back in the chair. For a second, I swear I see something darting past the filling cabinet. A shadow? A tail? No. I’m imagining things. …Right?)
No more coffee. That’s it. No more coffee. I’m switching to… water. Or air. Yes…just air..
You have demonstrated… persistence. Obsession. An unhealthy attachment to stickers. This pleases upper management.
(This isn’t like Manager at all… What has gotten into them? Have they suddenly changed their tune in at the last possible moment..? They loom closer…)
Continue your labor. Or… collapse. Either outcome is satisfactory.
(I gulp. Suddenly, Manager is gone – and I’m wide awake again. …Mostly.)
(Wait a second… are they.. coming back? Wait, were they even here at all? Uwahhhhhh…)
(This is it… the moment meow’ve all been waiting for. Or, uh, at least I have.)
(It all comes down to this… Let’s get meowschievious!)
scene4_game: Help Sweet Potato get Dazy fired by finding items to knock over in her office before the timer runs out!
There might be a special sticker/stationery to find in the room that’ll give you extra points! If you find all of them, something interesting might happen…
scene4_end: (Oh. Oh no. The big, not-really-scary-but-right-now-they’re-super-scary suit is here – The manager. I didn’t plan for this!)
(I crouch low behind the filing cabinet, my tail twitching. The stolen sticker stash glimmers in the dim light.)
(If I just sneak out now, she’ll never know. Easy. Simple. …But if she sees me… ohhhh, it’s curtains. No more secret missions. No more crusade. No more HEADPATS!!!!)
(I slowly edge forward. A pencil clatters to the floor. The manager’s head naps toward the sound.)
Dude, you’ve been working sooooooo much tonight. I can’t wait to see the awesome epic job you did!
“Awesome” and “epic” are not the words I’d use to describe it.
Hehehe, let’s see what ya got!
(Manager is so nonchalant, but… has my fate been decided?)
(My heart pounds. Are they going to fire me? Promote me? …Turn me into stationery?)
endings_check: (This is where branching would happen based on gameplay performance.)
good_ending: This… this isn’t enough at all! Just a single pen? And a half-baked eraser?
(How can I even explain? My stickers, my pens, they’re all– This was my fault, wasn’t it?)
(I should’ve known better than to try to take this on by myself…)
That blows, dude… My magical girl anime… They’ll never collab with us nowww…
(I saw this storm coming from miles away. The always-smiley Manager now looks as though they’ll explode into tears…)
Wahhhhhh!!!! I’m sorry dude but you are super duper FIRED!
(I say nothing. I’m speechless, yet unsurprised.)
(Should’ve drank another pumpkin latte… with oat milk… and 7 pumps of pumpkin sauce…)
(After that exhausting night shift that went down in thankfully nonexistent flames, I haven’t a spark of energy left in my body…)
Things might be awful, but… At least I have you, Sweet Potato.
You’re always there for me, meowing at my bedsheets in the morning and sitting on my keyboard at night…
Not like the people at Stooples. They always loved my work, but…
I wish they worked a little more, too.
Ah… I don’t need to stress too much if I’ve got you, Sweet Potato~
(It seems like my little heist was a.. MEOWGENDARY SUCCESS!)
(Why do I feel a little bad, though?)
...Nahhh, I’m Lord Sweet Potato. I don’t make meowstakes – vict-purr-y is always mine! MEOW!
bad_ending: (I freeze up as Manager looks through my designs…)
Ohhhhh wowww, I mean look at this sticker! And this notebook? Knocks my slippers right off!
(I’m exhausted beyond words – but it seems that Manager is beyond pleased.)
(They don’t seem to notice the tornado that hit my office. Though I don’t remember being quite that clumsy…)
You know what we gotta do now, right?! THAT’S RIGHT! For being the raddest worker everrrr, you get to be: The SUPER-DUPER-MEGA-ULTRA EXECUTIVE OF ETERNAL STATIONERY PRODUCTION!
(And I thought being the Super-Duper Stationery Expert was a bit excessive…)
That’s… that’s not a real title.. is it?
(This just can’t be… All my hard work tonight, scratching things and knocking stuff over, has come to this?)
(She’ll have even longer hours… I’ll have to bid sweet adieu to my headpats… Woe is truly me…)
(At least she’ll make more money to buy me something fancier than Mew Mix…)
secret_ending: (Yes! Just one more sticker and then she’ll certainly be out of-)
Bro… This office really needs some patching up… It looks like the cat dragged it in!
(I’m remaining as silent as possible, hiding behind the desk. There’s no way that weird human is gonna find me – right?)
(EEP!! Oh no, it’s back to the adoption center for me for sure… Is this what game meowver feels like?)
Hi there, little guy! Never thought I’d see an office kitty around here, but I guess there’s a first for everything, right?
(I’m totally frozen, my fur’s standing on end, ohnononono-)
Don’t worry, my dude, I’m not here to hurt ya.
HAVE YOU NO KNOWLEDGE OF THE DYNAMIC BETWEEN FELINES AND HUMANS? This is– this is absolutely–
I thought everyone could do that.
Hahahaha. The more you know, I guess! But what brings you here? Waitttttt a minute – you’re Dazy’s cat!!
Ohmigosh, I’m like, your BIGGEST FAN EVER!!! She’s always showing me pics and you’re just the cutest little babyiest-
Well.. don’t meow-nd me being blunt..
(Without even realizing it, my fur’s standing up on end again, and I feel like hissing!)
But you have GOT to stop putting all of this company’s work on Dazy!!! Come on!! I’m just a little kitty and even I have the common sense not to exploit your one productive worker like that.
Wait, is that what it’s called? I just thought I’d give her more work because uhh.. she’s really good at it!
...You have got to be kitten me.
(Aiya, this human’s got a furball for brains! But maybe, jusssssssst maybe, I can knock some sense into them-)

Ooooh! I have a GREAT idea. So okay my mom actually gave me this job a couple months ago and was like “you need to learn how to be an Adult and do Adult things” right??? But I think I’m over this adulting thing already…
But you… Looking into your big ol’ eyes. Dude. I think you might have what it takes.
How about YOU become the manager!
(And just like that, I, Lord Sweet Potato, was deemed the new manager of the Stooples Company!)
(I’ve got a lot of work on my paws, but all my workers LOVE me. And I get to see Dazy all the time!)
(Andddd, she doesn’t have to be sad about losing her job! I guess we can call this mission a super success! Meowsome!)
